body:
# State of the Repo Report, December 2019

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics â enjoy! ð¤

849 authors (+6) have contributed to the project (merged contributions). Thank you! â¤ï¸

The repo contains 517 604 (+1 851) lines of text and 1 851 (+14) files.

22 515 (+247) commits have been made of which 4 599 (+87) are merge commits.

There are currently 343 (+19) open pull requests from in total 94 (+6) contributors.

If all open pull requests were merged the project line count would grow by roughly 35 percent.

The total set of open pull requests adds 212 858 lines, removes 31 388 lines and touches 3 841 distinct files.

The "median open pull request" adds 5 lines, removes 19 lines and touches 4 files.

Previous edition: [State of the Repo, November 2019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/17632)
